name: RiseUp
description:
Try to find out what happend after you woke up.
Talk with NPC and complete quests to move along with the story line.

Controls

W,A,S,D - Movement
Left control - Crouch
Left shift - Sprint
Left mouse button - Select
Right mouse button - Aim with equiped weapon
Middle mouse button - Throw item
Mouse scroll - Camera zoom

Installation
  1. Download game
  2. Unzip it
  3. Play!
